author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Colin Farrell put his muscles on display during LA stroll | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Wearing a white tank top, it was clear that the star hadn't forgot his weight lifting regime as he displayed muscular bare arms. Taking a closer look, you could see that the former bad boy's arms had a collection of tattoos that now appeared faded from rounds of laser removal treatment. Faded ink: The 36-year-old hunk's arms appeared to have the remains of several tattoos that were faded from laser treatments The celeb looked deep in conversation as he strode forward in simple sneakers. As he talked with his pal, you could see that Colin was rocking a hearty mustache on his upper lip. His hair was styled with a messy swoop in the front while the Phone Booth star kept up his pace with what looked like a fitness tracking bracelet around his wrist. Black and white and outta sight! The Irishman hit the pavement with a walking buddy who also sported monochrome duds The In Bruges actor looked like he was gearing up for a future role. According to a fresh report from Variety , The Lobster lead is in talks to star in the legal thriller Inner City alongside Denzel Washington. The film will follow Washington playing principled attorney Roman J Israel who is lead to extreme measures after he uncovers a legacy of scandal and corruption at his law firm. Farrell would join the production as one of Roman's fellow attorneys. Inner City was written by Nightcrawler's Dan Gilroy, who is also set to direct the film.
